lines.text: Eddie! You better start dawdling, or you're going to be on time for school!
Herman tried to build a ship inside a bottle. We had to break the bottle to get him out.
Oh, Marilyn... the circles under your eyes. How lovely you look today.
When is that silly bird going to get girls off his mind?
Grandpa, if you want the ketchup, just say "Please pass the ketchup", not "Shoot me the plasma!"
He looks a little like Cary Grant, the poor man.

[reading a poem he wrote as an advertising jingle for his mortuary employer]
When your days on earth are over / And you've gone to your reward, / Let us put you 'neath the clover / At a price you can afford.
